title: This Thanksgiving Turkey Recipe Is Easy and Foolproof
description: A mayonnaise-based marinade gives this bird from J. Kenji López-Alt its gorgeous finish. Spatchcocking and a simple brining technique get it evenly cooked and juicy.
dc:creator: J. Kenji López-Alt

media:content.media:credit: Christopher Simpson for The New York Times. Food Stylist: Simon Andrews. Prop Stylist: Paige Hicks.
